Name: Pixel Shooter
About the game: In this 2D platformer game, get your gun and shoot all monsters in your way or just run away to the exit. Your mission is to find the exit on each level. All levels are filled with monsters. You can kill or just run, it's up to you to decide. This game is created using an old asset from the Unity Asset Store. I expect that you like it.
